MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Burnage Close and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault and are continuing with the repairs and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:14 AM on Friday, 19 March 2021
